dialogs.description: Asking a local for directions to a famous landmark

lines.speaker: Tourist
lines.text: Excuse me, how do I get to the Statue of Liberty?

lines.speaker: Local
lines.text: You can take the subway to Bowling Green and then walk to the ferry terminal.

dialogs.description: Asking a store employee for directions to a specific store

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Hi, can you tell me where the nearest Apple store is?

lines.speaker: Employee
lines.text: Yes, it's just a few blocks away. You can walk down this street and turn left at the intersection.
